product_name: SmartWool Phd Outdoor Medium Crew Socks
long_description: SmartWool PhD Outdoor Medium Crew Socks feature a durable blend of wool, nylon and elastane, as well as a comfortable fit and smart design for great performance. 4 Degree Elite Fit System improves comfort; 2 elastics provide greater stretch and recovery to keep the socks in place. Ankle bands, upper instep bands, lower instep bands and arch bands connect to the feet for a great fit and feel. ReliaWool is a patented reinforcement construction that puts more wool in high-wear and high-impact areas to increase durability and comfort. Merino wool provides excellent temperature control and moisture management, so you're warm when it's cold and cool when it's warm. Strategically placed mesh zones provide ventilation for temperature and moisture management. Merino wool keeps your feet dry and inhospitable to bacteria that can cause odor. Medium-weight socks provide good cushioning and warmth on cool days. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly machine washed and dried without shrinking. Flat-knit toe seams resist wear. SmartWool PhD Outdoor Medium Crew Socks rise 8.5 in. height. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: SmartWool PhD Outdoor Medium Crew Socks feature a durable blend of wool, nylon and elastane, as well as a comfortable fit and smart design for great performance.
